title: Herbaspirillum autotrophicum
text: Herbaspirillum autotrophicum is a <a href="bacterium">bacterium</a> which cannot fix <a href="nitrogen">nitrogen</a> under laboratory conditions, like "<a href="Herbaspirillum%20seropedicae">Herbaspirillum seropedicae</a>", because it does not have the <a href="Nif%20gene">"Nif" gene</a>.
